Been using daisyUI for a while and I must say...such a fun addon for Tailwind CSS, well done üî•
If you want to build beautiful apps in no time, daisyUI is the way to go ‚ú® I've been using it for the past 6 months and can't imagine living without it...
It's great! Been using it in all my projects!
If you use Tailwind and want prepackaged components then I wholeheartedly recommend daisyUI! An awesome set of defaults that's super configurable üî•
We use daisyUI + Tailwind with our projects. It has been extremly helpful building websites fast and give us a red design line through several different projects.
I'm glad I found daisyUI. daisyUI is built with Tailwind CSS which makes it perfect fit for me.
daisyUI is amazing and I use it for all my projects
daisyUI is such a time saver
Using daisyui feels like using the old Bootstrap but with the additional power of Tailwind's customization.
I recommend you to use DaisyUi on top of Tailwind they work together and gives more possibilities and ease.
If you try daisyUI, there is no turning back... üòè
I found Tailwind CSS complicated, but daisyUI looks like something I can give a try.
Honestly, I spent like 20% of my time writing code and 80% of time playing with Tailwind CSS and daisyUI. Really love the daisyUI themes üòç
While I love the flexibility of Tailwind CSS, I always find myself configuring re-usable styles as I hammer out a visual concept. daisyUI made doing that a lot easier today.
PHP Developer, Writer, Speaker, and Teacher
I love daisyUI and we used it for a hackathon project last week
I would have never touched tailwindcss if it wasn't for DaisyUI ü§ó
DaisyUI is what I use for everything now.
I like to use Tailwind+DaisyUI to have a Bootstrap like experience.
Have been using DaisyUI and it works great!
If you want to create a quick MVP for your next project, I recommend DaisyUI. It offers a simple and elegant design.‚ú®

I was using bootstrap first than switched to tailwind but there's so many classes too much code, than i found daisyUI. if anyone coming from bootstrapcss background you will love daisyui for sure. üôå
DaisyUI really makes it super easy to get a clean looking MVP up and out the door.
Why did it take me so long to pair Tailwind with DaisyUI‚Ä¶ Now I feel like a 10X developer.
I used DaisyUI, super happy with it!
Using a component library such as daisyUI is such a productivity hack. No going back from that.
I think DaisyUI is very cool, it's easy to use and you can build a clean UI with it. üëç üòÅ
